translated: The person who does not accept a contradiction in any case does not accept a contradiction in the case of what is not accepted. Therefore, there is no dispute about what is not accepted.

original: de ltar rnam par gzhag pa de la rig pa 'am gzhi med pa yin pas de la smos so //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par gzhag pa de la rig pa 'am gzhi med pa yin pas de la smos so //

analyzed: rgol ba med pa dang phyir rgol bas gdon mi za bar gcig brjod pa na 'gyur ro //

original: cig car ci'i phyir ma brjod ce na bshad pa cig car 'jug pa na rang bzhin du gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

translated: Why is it not stated simultaneously? The explanation is: “Because when it is stated simultaneously, it does not occur in the form of a natural state.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa nyan pa dang nges par 'dzin pa dang lan gdab mi srid pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir 'jug pa 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa nyan pa dang nges par 'dzin pa dang lan gdab mi srid pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir 'jug pa 'bras bu med do //
translated: Why is that? The explanation is: “Because it is impossible to listen, to understand, and to respond, the occurrence is fruitless.”

analyzed: gal te phan tshun ma 'dres par brjod pa nyan par 'gyur ba de'i don nges par 'dzin pa'i lan du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one were to listen to the expression of the mutual non-confusion, then that would be a reply that definitely holds the meaning.

original: nam mkha'i gos can gyis brjod pas dus bzhin du cig car 'jug pa 'di thams cad la srid par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gos can gyis brjod pas dus bzhin du cig car 'jug pa 'di thams cad la srid par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But this simultaneous engagement of all of them in the expression of the sky-clad one is not possible.

original: de'i phyir gdon mis bar gcig sngar brjod pa las brjod par 'gyur ba des na rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rgol pa phyogs snga ma sgra mi rtag pa sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa rang gi khas blangs pa nye bar dgod par byed par brjod par bya'o
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mis bar gcig sngar brjod pa las brjod par 'gyur ba des na rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rgol pa phyogs snga ma sgra mi rtag pa sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa rang gi khas blangs pa nye bar dgod par byed par brjod par bya'o
translated: Therefore, since it is certain that the first expression is expressed, the proponent who is abiding in his nature should state the position that he accepts, such as proving that sound is impermanent.

translated: Otherwise, the opponent would not understand the stated reason, and the proponent would not be able to state the reply. The other opponents would also not be able to state the refutation that connects the reply and the proof.

original: yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //

translated: Therefore, the two parties in a debate are not very far apart in their use of fallacious reasonings and in their lack of eloquence when they engage in the discussion of nonexistence.

original: 'o na gal te rigs pa la 'jug pa de la rnam pa gnyis su ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'o na gal te rigs pa la 'jug pa de la rnam pa gnyis su ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur //

original: chos can gcig la 'gal bar nye bar dgod pa ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos can gcig la 'gal bar nye bar dgod pa ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can they be said to set forth the prior and subsequent parts of their arguments?

original: gdon mi za bar rigs pa la 'jug pa na de la gcig nye bar dgod par byed pa na rigs pa 'jug par 'os so //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar rigs pa la 'jug pa na de la gcig nye bar dgod par byed pa na rigs pa 'jug par 'os so //
translated: They are said to do so when they engage in a discussion of reason, and when one of them sets forth a prior and subsequent part of his argument that is worthy of being considered a discussion of reason.

original: de lta ma yin na chos can gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na chos can gnyis su 'gyur ro //

original: bsam pa yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their intentions are not fully understood.

original: khyed kyis 'di'i rigs pa la 'jug pa slob dpon gyis brjod par 'dod par shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'di'i rigs pa la 'jug pa slob dpon gyis brjod par 'dod par shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: You do not understand that the master's intention in this is to engage in reasoning.

analyzed: de dag gis ni gcig gi dbang du byas nas 'gal bar khas blangs pa ni gags su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhum pa'i lan bstan pa yin no //
translated: By those, it is shown that the response to the objection, If one accepts contradiction with respect to one, it becomes an obstacle, etc., is based on one.

original: ji ltar lan bstan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar lan bstan pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is the response shown?

original: bshad pa khas blangs pa med par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa khas blangs pa med par med pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: rang gi phyogs rnam par 'jog pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs rnam par 'jog pa ni /

analyzed: tshig gi tshogs dman pa ni zhum par brjod pa'o //

analyzed: gal te zhum pa la rang gi phyogs med pa de lta na ji ltar rtsod pa med pa brjod par 'gyur //

analyzed: phyogs dgag pa'i don ni zhum pa 'jug go zhe na /
translated: The meaning of the negation of the extremes is to enter into the middle way.🔽

translated: If you say that the meaning of the negation of the opponent’s position is the establishment of one’s own position, then, since the negation of the opponent’s position and the establishment of one’s own position are the same, whatever is the negation of the opponent’s position, that is one’s own position.

original: gzhan gyis dgag pa des na ma blangs pas rang gi phyogs la shin tu 'jug par mi @138a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyis dgag pa des na ma blangs pas rang gi phyogs la shin tu 'jug par mi @138a * //

original: 'gyur ro // 'on kyang gang gi tshe rtsod pa khas blangs nas dam bca' ba tsam gyis rnam par g-yengs pas 'khrul 'khor gyi 'jigs pas 'khrul par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: and he says something else, and he establishes something else, and he says something else that is different from what he appears to be saying, then a crow with a harsh voice will appear in my house.

analyzed: des chog gi 'on kyang re zhig khyim du 'gro dgos te pha 'am gzhan zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de'i tshe ji ltar gtan tshigs med na sgrub par byed pa med pas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du par 'gyur zhes bsams pa'o //

analyzed: des na skyon ltar snang ba brjod pa nyid kyis nus pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rgol ba ma yin te /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de lta na yang de skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams tshar gcad pa'i gnas su bshad zin pa la /

analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' khas blangs nas phyogs yongs su gzung bar byas pa la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no certainty in the thorough apprehension of the position in the absence of the assertion of tenets.

translated: Having presented this thesis, the Sāṃkhya states the reason: “Because the manifestation of a single nature is seen in the manifestation of the great one and so on.”

analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni bsags pa'o //

analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / rmongs pa dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi gsal ba ni sngar bstan te /

translated: For example, it is like the doctrine of the Sāṃkhyas.

analyzed: de'i phyir de bde ba dag gi sgo nas rang bzhin gcig pa 'di gsal ba tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the conclusion is that this [consciousness] is one in nature due to pleasure, etc., but is a different manifestation.

analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur ba'i gsum pa'o //

translated: The meaning is that this one nature of the state of pleasure, etc. is a different manifestation.

analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa rang bzhin gcig pa'i gsal ba dang mi gsal bar 'gyur ba'i rjes su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is taught in order to show that the one nature becomes manifest and unmanifest.

translated: This is what is being shown: the nature of the one nature is not different from all things, because it is the nature that pervades the manifest and the unmanifest.

analyzed: gang gsal bar 'gyur ba ni chen po la sogs pa'o //

translated: By intrinsic nature,

analyzed: yod pa'i gnas skabs kyi ngo bo bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni gsal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The nature of the entity that exists, such as pleasure, is not manifest,

original: de'i bzlog pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir sems can shes pa bzhin du 'am /
analyzed: de'i bzlog pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir sems can shes pa bzhin du 'am /
translated: because it is the opposite of that, like a sentient being who is conscious,

original: bde ba dang gsal ba de dag gcig gi rang bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba dang gsal ba de dag gcig gi rang bzhin ma yin te /
translated: or those, pleasure and manifestation, are not of the same nature,

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa'i phyir rdul dang snying stobs dang mun pa bzhin no //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa'i phyir rdul dang snying stobs dang mun pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is not possible for mutually contradictory properties to exist in the same place, like atoms of light and darkness.

original: de lta na yang gsal ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rigs te /
analyzed: de lta na yang gsal ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rigs te /
translated: Even so, manifestation is not of the nature of pleasure, etc.,

original: bde ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
translated: because pleasure, etc., are seen to be concomitant with it. The reason is unestablished.

original: ci'i phyir 'di 'brel pa'i skyon yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di 'brel pa'i skyon yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this a fault of the relation?

original: de lta na grangs can de'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i skyon brjod pas brtsad pa na gsal pa 'di dang rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes bya ba sun dbyung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na grangs can de'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i skyon brjod pas brtsad pa na gsal pa 'di dang rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes bya ba sun dbyung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, when the Sāṃkhya is criticized for the fault of the reason being unestablished in the proof, “Because manifestation is of the same nature as pleasure, etc.,” he would be refuted by saying, “This manifestation is of the same nature as pleasure, etc.”

original: yang rigs pa can des grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i skyon bstan pa med pa dang bshad pa med par rang bzhin ma yin pa dang rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig rgyas par bshad nas rang gi skyon nges pa med pa'i gtan
analyzed: yang rigs pa can des grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i skyon bstan pa med pa dang bshad pa med par rang bzhin ma yin pa dang rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig rgyas par bshad nas rang gi skyon nges pa med pa'i gtan
translated: Again, the Naiyāyika explains the fault of the proof that establishes the definition of nature and transformation without explanation and without indication, having extensively explained the words that posit the definition of nature and transformation.

original: tshigs zhar la byung ba'i gzhan grangs can gyi dka' thub la skyon 'gel bar byed do //
analyzed: tshigs zhar la byung ba'i gzhan grangs can gyi dka' thub la skyon 'gel bar byed do //
translated: He imputes a fault to the Sāṃkhya’s austerity that is extraneous to the argument.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa gal te grangs can la ma grub pa'i skyon gyi rnam pa 'di nyid kyi rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas kho bo cag gis brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa gal te grangs can la ma grub pa'i skyon gyi rnam pa 'di nyid kyi rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas kho bo cag gis brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the Sāṃkhya says, “We have stated this very form of the fault that is not established for the Sāṃkhya from the perspective of positing the definition of nature and transformation,”

original: slob dpon gyis smras pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis smras pa /
translated: the master says:

original: 'di ni rgyu skar mkhas kyi yul can gang yin pa de ni bshad zin pa'i ngag gi don yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyu skar mkhas kyi yul can gang yin pa de ni bshad zin pa'i ngag gi don yin no //
translated: This is the domain of the expert in the stars. That is the meaning of the statement that has been explained.

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i sgras ma bstan pa rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i sgras ma bstan pa rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: Because it is not possible to understand what is not taught by the words of the world.

original: don gyi byed pa la sogs pa med kyang tha snyad du 'gyur ba de'i phyir de nyid dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i gnas skabs kyi skyon med do //
analyzed: don gyi byed pa la sogs pa med kyang tha snyad du 'gyur ba de'i phyir de nyid dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i gnas skabs kyi skyon med do //
translated: And because there is usage even without the activity of the object, etc., therefore there is no fault of contradiction with the thesis in the case of the establishment of the example.

original: glu gar mkhan gyis yi ge 'dri ba'i tshul lo //🔽grub pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di la yang yin /
analyzed: glu gar mkhan gyis yi ge 'dri ba'i tshul lo // grub pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di la yang yin /
translated: The way of writing letters by the dancer and singer.

original: de 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no //
translated: This is the conclusion, and it is not only that.

original: dper na rdza mkhan gyis par skabs su ngo mtshar byed de myur du zla ba tshes gcig pa'i ngo mtshar bris nas smras pa kho bo cag gis glang po sa la bris pa la ltos dang zhes 'don te /🔽de la blo dman pa 'ga' zhig ni de bzhin du rtogs so //
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan gyis par skabs su ngo mtshar byed de myur du zla ba tshes gcig pa'i ngo mtshar bris nas smras pa kho bo cag gis glang po sa la bris pa la ltos dang zhes 'don te / de la blo dman pa 'ga' zhig ni de bzhin du rtogs so //
translated: For example, the potter, having written the wonder of the first day of the moon quickly, says, “Look at the wonder of the elephant written by us.”🔽Among them, some of little intelligence understand it just as it is.

original: blo rno ba 'ga' zhig rnam par dpyod par byed do //
analyzed: blo rno ba 'ga' zhig rnam par dpyod par byed do //
translated: Some of sharp intelligence analyze it.

original: 'o na 'di la rna ba dang rkang mig dang @144b so la sogs pa med do zhes rtog pas de ma tshang bas 'di glang po cher ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na 'di la rna ba dang rkang mig dang @144b so la sogs pa med do zhes rtog pas de ma tshang bas 'di glang po cher ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But if one thinks, “In this case, there is no trunk, feet, eyes, teeth, and so on,” then because it is incomplete, how could it be an elephant?

original: de la glang po che yod par rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: de la glang po che yod par rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: But it is not realized that the elephant exists.

original: kho bo cag gis cha shas ma lus par rdzogs pa'i glang po'i sna 'di bris pas de'i tshe ma lus pa yin na chu'i nang du bum pa ma dmigs te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis cha shas ma lus par rdzogs pa'i glang po'i sna 'di bris pas de'i tshe ma lus pa yin na chu'i nang du bum pa ma dmigs te /
translated: We have drawn the trunk of the elephant that is complete without any parts missing. At that time, if it is complete, then the pot is not observed in the water.

original: bum pa cha tsam mthong ba yin no zhes so //
analyzed: bum pa cha tsam mthong ba yin no zhes so //
translated: But it is seen as a part of the pot.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i ngag gis gzhan yang ngo mtshar byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i ngag gis gzhan yang ngo mtshar byed do //
translated: In this way, our words are amazing.

original: gal te don ni kho bo cag gi ngag gis mi rtogs pa de lta na yang rnam pa 'dis 'di brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te don ni kho bo cag gi ngag gis mi rtogs pa de lta na yang rnam pa 'dis 'di brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the object is not realized by our words, then in this way it is expressed.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i don gyi rnam pa gzhan 'di yin pa de lta na yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir dang de nyid tshig gis brjod pa'i phyir grub mtha' nyams pa zhes bya ba logs shig tu khas blang bar
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i don gyi rnam pa gzhan 'di yin pa de lta na yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir dang de nyid tshig gis brjod pa'i phyir grub mtha' nyams pa zhes bya ba logs shig tu khas blang bar
translated: Although the meaning of the above explanation is different, since it is included in the category of unestablished reasons, and since it is expressed in words, it should not be accepted as a separate category called “defeat of the philosophical position.”

original: mi bya'o // de nyid zur gyis mjug bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi bya'o // de nyid zur gyis mjug bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The conclusion is stated indirectly:

original: 'di skad bshad pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The reasonings explained in this way…”

original: ji skad du mdo las /
analyzed: ji skad du mdo las /
translated: As it is said in the sūtras:

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bshad pa 'di bad tsha ya nas brtags pa sngon du btang nas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bshad pa 'di bad tsha ya nas brtags pa sngon du btang nas bshad pa yin no //
translated: “The explanation of the fallacious reasons was taught after first examining the bad system of Bhadrāyana.”

original: yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid las gzhan mtshan nyid de dang 'brel pa ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid las gzhan mtshan nyid de dang 'brel pa ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid du gyur pa'o //
translated: “Other than the definition of a fallacious reason, that which is related to that definition is a basis for defeat.”

original: ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: bshad pa dper na tshad ma dag mtshan nyid gzhan gyi dbang gis gzhal bya nyid du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa dper na tshad ma dag mtshan nyid gzhan gyi dbang gis gzhal bya nyid du gyur pa yin te /
translated: For example, valid cognitions become objects of comprehension by the power of another valid cognition.

original: de ni tshad ma'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is the activity of a valid cognition.

original: gang tshad ma yang tshad ma gzhan gyis 'jal bar byed pa de'i tshe tshad ma'i bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang tshad ma yang tshad ma gzhan gyis 'jal bar byed pa de'i tshe tshad ma'i bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When a valid cognition is measured by another valid cognition, at that time it becomes the activity of a valid cognition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir the tshom za bas 'dri ba ni don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir the tshom za bas 'dri ba ni don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is the meaning that is questioned because of doubt.

original: 'dir thub pas ji skad bshad pa'i rtsa ba dang 'grel pa las ji skad bstan pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid kho na tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'dir thub pas ji skad bshad pa'i rtsa ba dang 'grel pa las ji skad bstan pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid kho na tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
translated: Here, it is said that the definition of a fallacious reason, as it is taught in the root text and commentary of the Sage, is the basis of defeat.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'gal ba'i rnam pa dang / skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / 'das pa dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir re re'i mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid 'chad de /🔽ma nges pa dang 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / grub pa'i mtha' khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i 'gal ba dang logs shig tu gtan la phab pa'i don gang yin pa bshad pa'i skabs dang @145a * //
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'gal ba'i rnam pa dang / skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / 'das pa dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir re re'i mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid 'chad de / ma nges pa dang 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / grub pa'i mtha' khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i 'gal ba dang logs shig tu gtan la phab pa'i don gang yin pa bshad pa'i skabs dang @145a * //
translated: The basis and definition of each of these are explained in order to demonstrate that they are different.🔽The basis and definition of the first, inconclusive, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of inconclusive, which is a reason that is not established for one or both parties, and the basis and definition of the second, contradictory, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of contradictory, which is a reason that contradicts one's own thesis.🔽The basis and definition of the third, not a reason, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of not a reason, which is a reason that does not establish the probandum.

original: mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du gyur pa dang bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / mtshungs pa dang dus gsum du bshad pa dang / dus 'das pa zhes bya ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'di tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin gyi /
analyzed: mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du gyur pa dang bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / mtshungs pa dang dus gsum du bshad pa dang / dus 'das pa zhes bya ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'di tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin gyi /
translated: The basis and definition of the fourth, irrelevant, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of irrelevant, which is a reason that does not establish the probandum.🔽The basis and definition of the fifth, mistaken, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of mistaken, which is a reason that is not established in the way it is stated.🔽The basis and definition of the sixth, contradictory to a treatise, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of contradictory to a treatise, which is a reason that contradicts the tenets of one's own school.🔽The basis and definition of the seventh, contradictory to commonly perceived fact, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of contradictory to commonly perceived fact, which is a reason that contradicts what is commonly perceived by everyone.🔽The basis and definition of the eighth, irrelevant to the point, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of irrelevant to the point, which is a reason that is not relevant to the point.🔽The basis and definition of the ninth, past the point, are explained in order to explain the meaning of the basis and definition of past the point, which is a reason that is past the point of the probandum.

original: yang de la mtshan nyid gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang de la mtshan nyid gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Nor does it depend on another characteristic.

original: slob dpon gyis 'dir yang smos te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'dir yang smos te /
translated: The master has also stated this here.

original: ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
translated: How?

original: ci de dag ji skad du khyed kyis mtshon par bya ba'i rab tu dbye ba de lta bu nyid yod dam 'on te rnam pa gzhan yin zhes mtshon par bya /
analyzed: ci de dag ji skad du khyed kyis mtshon par bya ba'i rab tu dbye ba de lta bu nyid yod dam 'on te rnam pa gzhan yin zhes mtshon par bya /
translated: Should we ask whether the classification of those things is just as you have characterized it, or is it otherwise?

original: gang dag gi rnam par dbye ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang dag gi rnam par dbye ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase “their classification” is supplied.

original: de lta na yang ci'i phyir rnam par mi dpyod ce na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ci'i phyir rnam par mi dpyod ce na /
translated: Even if that is so, why is it not analyzed?

original: de dpyad par bya ba yin na ni 'dir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma spros pa'o //
analyzed: de dpyad par bya ba yin na ni 'dir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma spros pa'o //
translated: If it were to be analyzed, it would lead to an absurd consequence here.

original: 'di ni 'di yin no snyam du dgongs nas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par ma dpyad pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar rnam 'grel byed pa'i gzhung gi rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan kho nar gyur la
analyzed: 'di ni 'di yin no snyam du dgongs nas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par ma dpyad pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar rnam 'grel byed pa'i gzhung gi rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan kho nar gyur la
translated: Thinking that this is so, he says, “This is included among fallacious reasons,” because it is taught in another treatise that follows the text of the commentary on the definition of a fallacious reason.

original: blo gsal bas rnam par dpyad na /
analyzed: blo gsal bas rnam par dpyad na /
translated: If one analyzes with clear mind,

original: kho bo cag gis byas pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid las rang du gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis byas pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid las rang du gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, like the reason that we have stated, it is the case that suffering is known to be self-made.

original: de'i phyir btang snyoms su bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir btang snyoms su bya bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to be indifferent.

original: de lta na yang blo dman pas phyogs tsam nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin no //🔽dus 'das pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus ni re zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ji ltar mi rigs pa de ltar gnas so //
analyzed: de lta na yang blo dman pas phyogs tsam nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin no // dus 'das pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus ni re zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ji ltar mi rigs pa de ltar gnas so //
translated: Even so, I have stated this just to make clear the position of those of lesser intellect.🔽The time of the past

original: de la dus gzhan du sbyar ba ni dus 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de la dus gzhan du sbyar ba ni dus 'das pa'o //
translated: The time of the past is the time when a reason is not a reason.

original: rigs pa can rgan po rnams kyi gzhung de ni 'dir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sun 'byin zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa can rgan po rnams kyi gzhung de ni 'dir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sun 'byin zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The text of the old Naiyāyikas has been refuted here by master Bhāviveka.

original: da ni bad tsha ya na la sogs pa 'dir gnas pa'i phyogs kyis gnas pa de la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni bad tsha ya na la sogs pa 'dir gnas pa'i phyogs kyis gnas pa de la brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, let us state the position of those who abide here, such as Bhadrayānīya.

original: dus gzhan dang ldan pa gang gi don gyi phyogs gcig bstan pas ma lus pa la rigs pa bstan pa ni dus 'das pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: dus gzhan dang ldan pa gang gi don gyi phyogs gcig bstan pas ma lus pa la rigs pa bstan pa ni dus 'das pa zhes bshad do //
translated: The statement of a reason that applies to all cases by stating one part of the meaning in terms of another time is called “past time.”

original: dper na sgra ni rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra ni rtag ste /
translated: For example: Sound is permanent.

original: 'brel pa gsal ba'i gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa gsal ba'i gzugs bzhin no //
translated: Because it is manifest like a manifest form.

original: de snga ma dang phyi mar gsal ba rnam par gnas pa la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de snga ma dang phyi mar gsal ba rnam par gnas pa la brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be said that it is manifest in the past and future.

original: dus gzhan dang ldan pa gzung 'dzin bum pa 'brel ba las gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus gzhan dang ldan pa gzung 'dzin bum pa 'brel ba las gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is manifest in terms of another time is apprehended in terms of the connection of the object and subject.

original: de bzhin du rda bo che la sgra @145b gnas pa dbyug pa la 'brel pa yin pa dang / shing sta re dang 'brel pa las gsal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rda bo che la sgra @145b gnas pa dbyug pa la 'brel pa yin pa dang / shing sta re dang 'brel pa las gsal par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the sound that resides in a drum is manifest in terms of the connection with the stick, and the tree is manifest in terms of the connection with the axe.

original: de'i phyir sgra rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rtag pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, sound is permanent.

original: 'brel pas gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pas gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is manifest in terms of the connection.

original: gtan tshigs 'di ni dus gzhan bstan pa'i phyir 'brel pas gsal ba'i du ni gsal bar bya'i ngo bo gzhan gsal ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ni dus gzhan bstan pa'i phyir 'brel pas gsal ba'i du ni gsal bar bya'i ngo bo gzhan gsal ba ni ma yin te /
translated: This reason is stated in terms of another time. The manifest in terms of the connection is the manifest of the present, not the manifest of another nature.

original: sgron ma dang 'brel ba'i ngo bo 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sgron ma dang 'brel ba'i ngo bo 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The nature that is connected with the lamp is apprehended.

original: 'brel pas ngo bo ldog par 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: 'brel pas ngo bo ldog par 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: The nature of the sound is not destroyed by the connection.

original: sta re dang 'brel pas shing gi ngo bo ldog par 'gyur ba ni med do //
analyzed: sta re dang 'brel pas shing gi ngo bo ldog par 'gyur ba ni med do //
translated: The nature of the tree is not destroyed by the connection with the axe.

original: rdang brdungs pa'i dus dang 'brel ba'i sgra ring po na gnas pa yang sgra gsal bar thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdang brdungs pa'i dus dang 'brel ba'i sgra ring po na gnas pa yang sgra gsal bar thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: And when the sound is long, it is heard clearly, even though it is connected with the time of the striking.

original: dus dang 'brel pa'i gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: dus dang 'brel pa'i gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: The sound is not different from the time, because of the connection.

original: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu med pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu med pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the sound is not different from the time, because of the connection, then the sound would not be heard, because of the non-existence of the sound, like the result of a non-existent cause.

original: 'o na gtan tshigs 'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'o na gtan tshigs 'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: If you say that the sound is not different from the time, because of the connection, then this reason is not established.

original: mi rtag pa yang 'brel pas gsal bar mthong ste bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang 'brel pas gsal bar mthong ste bum pa bzhin no //
translated: The impermanent is seen to be clear, because of the connection, like a pot.

original: 'brel pas gnas skabs kyi gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pas gnas skabs kyi gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: The sound is not clear, because of the connection with the time.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the probandum.

original: mi rtag ste /
analyzed: mi rtag ste /
translated: The sound is impermanent.

original: sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes rnam par gnas pa ni mi smra ste /
analyzed: sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes rnam par gnas pa ni mi smra ste /
translated: We do not say that the sound is impermanent, because of the connection with the time, like a pot.

original: sgra zhes bya ba 'di dam bca' ba'i don yin pa de bzhin du 'brel pas gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba 'di dam bca' ba'i don yin pa de bzhin du 'brel pas gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
translated: Just as “sound” is the meaning of the thesis, so too “because of being manifested by the connection” is the meaning of the reason.

original: 'brel pas gsal bar bya ba mthong ba ni cung zad cig gnas pa med do //
analyzed: 'brel pas gsal bar bya ba mthong ba ni cung zad cig gnas pa med do //
translated: But this is an uncertain reason, because there is no seeing of anything that is manifested by the connection.

original: des na rnam par gnas pa 'dis 'dir 'brel pa gsal bar byed pa nyid sgra la bkag pas 'di ma grub pa las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rnam par gnas pa 'dis 'dir 'brel pa gsal bar byed pa nyid sgra la bkag pas 'di ma grub pa las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since this is the case, the manifestation of the connection by the word is refuted here, and so this is not a reversal of the nonestablishment of the reason.

original: de lta ma yin na sgra ni gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgra ni gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the word would be manifested.

original: 'brel pa'i dus gzhan yin no zhes bya ba dang / 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba gcig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i dus gzhan yin no zhes bya ba dang / 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba gcig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: It should not be said that the connection is at another time or that the connection is not the reason.

original: las su bya ba thams cad ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: las su bya ba thams cad ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: All activity does not exist.

original: 'di yang ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not unestablished.

original: thams cad du ma grub pa ma yin gyi skye ba dang 'brel pa'i dus su gsal bar 'gyur ba ni yod pa yin yang nye bar gyur ba ni mi dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad du ma grub pa ma yin gyi skye ba dang 'brel pa'i dus su gsal bar 'gyur ba ni yod pa yin yang nye bar gyur ba ni mi dmigs so zhe na /
translated: It is not that it does not exist at all, but that it is not perceived when it is close by, although it does exist at the time when it is related to arising.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not a correct response.

original: phyogs gcig la ma grub pa yang ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig la ma grub pa yang ma grub pa yin te /
translated: If it is not established in one part, it is not established.

original: dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a thesis.

original: dper na rdul phra mo ni rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na rdul phra mo ni rtag ste /
translated: For example, it is like saying, “An atom is permanent,

original: dri dang ldan pa'i phyir ram /

original: shed rnams ni sems pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: shed rnams ni sems pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: or “The elements have consciousness,

analyzed: nyal ba'i phyir ro // gang la sgra mi rtag pa yin no @146a * //
translated: because they sleep.”

original: zhes bya ba sta re dang shing gi 'brel pa la sogs pa des shes pa yin na sgra skye ba nyid du shes pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba sta re dang shing gi 'brel pa la sogs pa des shes pa yin na sgra skye ba nyid du shes pa yin no //
translated: If the connection of the axe and the tree, etc. are known by the statement, “Sound is impermanent,” then the arising of sound is known.

original: yang na gnas skabs kyi gsal ba las gsal ba 'di gzhan yin par ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na gnas skabs kyi gsal ba las gsal ba 'di gzhan yin par ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Or, it is not established that this manifestation is different from the manifestation of the state.

original: 'o na te 'brel pa nye bar dmigs so zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ni dam bca' ba yin gyi gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lan no snyam na de lta na yang mar me sdong du dang 'brel pa dang
analyzed: 'o na te 'brel pa nye bar dmigs so zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ni dam bca' ba yin gyi gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lan no snyam na de lta na yang mar me sdong du dang 'brel pa dang
translated: But the meaning of the reason “because of the perception of a connection” is the thesis, and not the unestablished reason.

original: / rdza mkhan dang 'jim pa dang dbyig pa dang 'brel par gyur pas sgron ma dang bum pa yang dag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / rdza mkhan dang 'jim pa dang dbyig pa dang 'brel par gyur pas sgron ma dang bum pa yang dag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //

original: de dag de dang 'brel pas snga ma'i gnas skabs ni ma yin pas ma nges pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir dus 'das pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag de dang 'brel pas snga ma'i gnas skabs ni ma yin pas ma nges pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir dus 'das pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Since they are connected with them, they are not in their former state, and so they do not become the past.

original: de'i phyir dus kyi gnas skabs bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni skyes ma thag 'jug pa smra ba la yang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus kyi gnas skabs bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni skyes ma thag 'jug pa smra ba la yang 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, if the state of time is to be established, there is no contradiction in the theory of the Sautrantikas that the past is that which is in the process of arising.

analyzed: byas zin pa gang yin pa de gtan la 'bebs pa'i don la sbyor ba na gnyis ka phyogs la yang mtshungs pas skabs su mi 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: When one applies oneself to the meaning of determining what has been done, both are the same in terms of the position, so it is similar to the situation of not engaging.

original: gtan la dbab cing brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gtan la dbab cing brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not determine or investigate.

original: gnas skabs spyod pa na de kho na nyid mi dmigs pa ci'i phyir zhes gang gi phyir de kho na don du gnyer bas spyad na dmigs pa ldog pa de'i phyir mtshungs pa dang lhag ma dang khyad par du gyur pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnas skabs spyod pa na de kho na nyid mi dmigs pa ci'i phyir zhes gang gi phyir de kho na don du gnyer bas spyad na dmigs pa ldog pa de'i phyir mtshungs pa dang lhag ma dang khyad par du gyur pa mi dmigs so //
translated: When one is engaged in the situation, why is the non-observation of reality? Because if one engages for the sake of reality, the observation is reversed. Therefore, the non-observation of the similar, the remainder, and the distinguished is for that reason.

original: de skabs su bab pa dpyad pa ni dgongs pa yin te /
analyzed: de skabs su bab pa dpyad pa ni dgongs pa yin te /
translated: The intention is to analyze what is appropriate in that situation.

original: sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent.

original: rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the quality of permanence is not observed.

original: @146b snod la sogs pa la mi rtag pa dang mthong la rtag pa'i chos ni mi dmigs te /
analyzed: @146b snod la sogs pa la mi rtag pa dang mthong la rtag pa'i chos ni mi dmigs te /
translated: In a pot and so on, impermanence is seen, but the quality of permanence is not observed.

original: chos mtshungs pa gang la the tshom gyi rgyu'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ni the tshom dang mtshungs pa 'am 'khrul pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: chos mtshungs pa gang la the tshom gyi rgyu'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ni the tshom dang mtshungs pa 'am 'khrul pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: The reason that is the cause of doubt in regard to a similar property is called “doubtful” or “erroneous.”

original: gang yang yid gnyis dang bcas pas khyad par mi ltos pa ni gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi khyad par mi dmigs pas skabs dang bcas pa la 'jug pa'i dper na sgra la rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin mi rtag pa'i chos kyang yin la 'di gnyi ga'i phyogs kyang mi dmigs la de dpyod pa'i gnas skabs su dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang yang yid gnyis dang bcas pas khyad par mi ltos pa ni gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi khyad par mi dmigs pas skabs dang bcas pa la 'jug pa'i dper na sgra la rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin mi rtag pa'i chos kyang yin la 'di gnyi ga'i phyogs kyang mi dmigs la de dpyod pa'i gnas skabs su dgongs pa yin no //
translated: When one is doubtful, the non-observation of a distinguishing property is not a reason, because the non-observation of a distinguishing property in both cases is inconclusive. For example, in the case of sound, the non-observation of the property of permanence and the non-observation of the property of impermanence are inconclusive. The intention is that these are the topics to be investigated.

original: ji ltar phyin ci log pa'i gnas skabs ldog par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar phyin ci log pa'i gnas skabs ldog par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one turn away from the state of error?

original: gal te rtag pa'i chos sgra la 'dzin pa yin na gnas skabs su mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te rtag pa'i chos sgra la 'dzin pa yin na gnas skabs su mi 'gyur la /
translated: If one grasps sound as having the property of permanence, one will not turn away from that state.

original: gal te mi rtag pa'i chos su 'dzin pa de ltan yang ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs der gtan tshigs de phyogs la yod pas gang yang rgyu gtan la phab par brtag par mi bya'i /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa'i chos su 'dzin pa de ltan yang ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs der gtan tshigs de phyogs la yod pas gang yang rgyu gtan la phab par brtag par mi bya'i /
translated: If you hold that the property of impermanence is a real entity, then at the time when the reason is present, the property to be established is also present. Therefore, you should not investigate whether the reason is established or not.

original: 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba khyad par med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba khyad par med pa kho na'o //
translated: The property to be established is just the same.

original: khyad par med pa nyid kyi gnas skabs la 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par med pa nyid kyi gnas skabs la 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not the case that the reason is present at the time when the property to be established is not present.

original: gtan tshigs kyi chos ni gtan tshigs kyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi chos ni gtan tshigs kyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The property of the reason is stated by the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par gtan tshigs su brjod na bsgrub bya dang khyad par med do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par gtan tshigs su brjod na bsgrub bya dang khyad par med do //
translated: If the reason is stated as the same as the property to be established, then the reason is not different from the property to be established.

original: yang gang la gnas skabs su 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs nyid de ni skabs dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang gang la gnas skabs su 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs nyid de ni skabs dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the reason that is present at the time when the property to be established is present is called “similar to the property to be established.”

original: 'dir yang rtag pa'i chos dmigs pa bstan pa nyid gnas skabs spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang rtag pa'i chos dmigs pa bstan pa nyid gnas skabs spyod pa yin te /
translated: Here, the property of permanence is taught as the observed object. It is present at the time when the reason is present.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: phyin ci log pa'i gnas skabs las ldog par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log pa'i gnas skabs las ldog par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated that the reason is present at the time when the property to be established is present.

original: gal te mi rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs su gyur pa yin na ni skabs dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs su gyur pa yin na ni skabs dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the reason is the non-apprehension of a impermanent phenomenon, then it is appropriate to the context.

original: de'i chos gcig mi dmigs pa chos su ma brjod na skabs dang mtshungs pas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i chos gcig mi dmigs pa chos su ma brjod na skabs dang mtshungs pas brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the non-apprehension of one of its properties is not stated as the reason, then it should be stated, since it is appropriate to the context.

original: gnyi ga'i chos mi dmigs par brjod par yang mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa med pa dang / ldog pa ma nges pa med pas thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i chos mi dmigs par brjod par yang mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa med pa dang / ldog pa ma nges pa med pas thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges par 'gyur te /
translated: If the non-apprehension of a property of both is stated, then it is not a common locus of the non-occurrence in the similar class and the non-exclusion from the dissimilar class, so it is an inconclusive reason.

original: ji ltar 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gzhan du 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gzhan du 'gyur /
translated: How can it be a fallacious reason?

original: chos gcig kyang ma dmigs par 'gyur na 'di skabs dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos gcig kyang ma dmigs par 'gyur na 'di skabs dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If even one property is not apprehended, then it is appropriate to the context.

original: de ltar yang sgra rtag par smra bar gdon mi za bar rmongs pas mi rtag pa'i chos rtogs par @147a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang sgra rtag par smra bar gdon mi za bar rmongs pas mi rtag pa'i chos rtogs par @147a * //
translated: Thus, if one who advocates that sound is permanent is certainly confused, then the apprehension of an impermanent property

original: brjod pa 'di ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod pa 'di ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: would be unestablished.

original: 'o na te tshad mas brtags pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi rtag pa'i phyin chos nye bar dmigs pa bsten /
analyzed: 'o na te tshad mas brtags pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi rtag pa'i phyin chos nye bar dmigs pa bsten /
translated: But if one relies on the observation of the property of the dissimilar class, which is examined by a valid cognition, then at that time, because it is ascertained, it is a correct reason. So how could it be a seemingly correct reason that is similar to the case under consideration?

original: de'i tshe nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs yin pas skabs dang mtshungs pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ji ltar 'gyur de ni bye brag la dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don du rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i tshe nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs yin pas skabs dang mtshungs pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ji ltar 'gyur de ni bye brag la dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don du rnam par gnas so //
translated: That is established as the meaning of a reason that is based on a specific case.

original: mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: It is impermanent

original: byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par du byas pa yin na des byas pa la skabs spyod par mi rigs te /
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par du byas pa yin na des byas pa la skabs spyod par mi rigs te /
translated: because it is produced. If one makes a distinction in this way, then it is not correct to rely on the produced in that case,

original: rtag pa tshad mas zlog par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa tshad mas zlog par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because permanence is refuted by a valid cognition.

original: gzhan yang rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa yin na /🔽ci 'di med par dgag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa yin na / ci 'di med par dgag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if the nonobservation of a permanent phenomenon is the reason,🔽is it an affirming negative or a nonaffirming negative?

original: yang ci ste 'gal bar brjod /
analyzed: yang ci ste 'gal bar brjod /
translated: If it is an affirming negative, then how could it be a nonobservation?🔽If it is a nonaffirming negative, then how could it be a reason?

original: gal te dgag par byed pa de'i tshe gzhal bya la sogs pa bzhin du thun mong gi ma nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dgag par byed pa de'i tshe gzhal bya la sogs pa bzhin du thun mong gi ma nges par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is an affirmation, then like the object of apprehension, etc., it is not ascertained in common.

original: rtag pa'i chos dgag pa tsam mi rtag pa spangs pa tsam yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i chos dgag pa tsam mi rtag pa spangs pa tsam yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, it is possible that the mere negation of a permanent entity is the mere exclusion of impermanence.

original: 'on te 'gal bar brjod pa'i tshe ma nges par rigs pa ma yin pa la gtan tshigs ltar bcos pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te 'gal bar brjod pa'i tshe ma nges par rigs pa ma yin pa la gtan tshigs ltar bcos pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But if it is an affirmation, then it is not right to say that it is not ascertained, because it is not right to make a pseudo-reason out of what is right.

original: gzhan yang rnam par gzhan mdo las gnyis ga bshad pa ni gtan tshigs gang gtan tshigs kyi dus su dus su 'das pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par gzhan mdo las gnyis ga bshad pa ni gtan tshigs gang gtan tshigs kyi dus su dus su 'das pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the explanation of both in the sutra is a reason, because it is a reason that is stated at the time of the reason.

original: ci'i phyir dus 'das pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dus 'das pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it a reason that is stated at the time of the reason?

original: mngon sum mam lung ngam gnyi ga las 'das pa dang / ma lus pa las 'das pa ni dus 'das pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: mngon sum mam lung ngam gnyi ga las 'das pa dang / ma lus pa las 'das pa ni dus 'das pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Because it is beyond direct perception, scripture, or both, and because it is beyond all.

original: gal te yang mngon sum dang lung dang 'gal ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang mngon sum dang lung dang 'gal ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If it is beyond direct perception and scripture, why is it?

original: mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir bshad pa yin te /
translated: It is explained to have four characteristics.

analyzed: gang yang rjes su dpag pa dang mngon sum dang lung dang 'gal ba ni rigs pa ltar snang ba yin no zhe'o //
translated: A reason that contradicts inference, perception, or scriptural testimony is a pseudo-reason.

original: mngon sum dang 'gal ba ni dper na me grang ba yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum dang 'gal ba ni dper na me grang ba yin te /
translated: A reason that is contradictory to perception is, for example, “Fire is cold,

analyzed: rdzas yin pa'i phyir chu bzhin no //

analyzed: lung dang 'gal ba ni bram zes chang btung bar bya ste /

original: 'di phyogs dang 'gal ba ni 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di phyogs dang 'gal ba ni 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: This is not a contradiction to a position.

original: phyogs dang 'gal ba ni spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs dang 'gal ba ni spangs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: des na 'di ni tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang 'gal bas sdug bsngal ba yin te / tshul gsum pa ni rang / ji ltar ba'i rang gi tshad mas nges pa'i phyir ro //

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa gsum ni /

analyzed: gang la gnod pa yod pa de 'brel pa yod pa yin te / gnod pa ni med na mi 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dang / med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /

analyzed: gnod par bya ba yul yin pa'i phyir skyon gyi rjes su 'brang bar bshad par bya'o //

analyzed: gang yang phyogs kyi skyon yongs su spangs nas ma 'brel pa mang po brjod pa ni shin tu yang snying po med do //
translated: Moreover, the many statements that avoid the fault of the subject but are unrelated are completely pointless.

original: gang gi phyir skabs spyod pa na rnam bshad kyis skabs spyod pa de'i dper brjod pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skabs spyod pa na rnam bshad kyis skabs spyod pa de'i dper brjod pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is an example of the context of the explanation.

original: rdul phra mo ni rdul phra mo gzhan gyi 'bras bur bstan pa yin nam ma yin zhes spyod pa na 'ga' zhig rjod par byed na ni rdul phra mo'i rdul phra mo gzhan gyi 'bras bu yin te /

analyzed: de las tha dad par gyur pa yin na ni skabs dang mtshungs pa ma nges pa ma yin no //

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di'i skyon gyi bye brag rab tu rgyas par bshad zin @149a * //
translated: The faults of this have already been extensively explained.

analyzed: to ; /'dir skabs dang mtshungs pa dang dus 'das pa la sogs pa'i rigs pa ma yin no //

analyzed: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid yin no //
translated: Even the one with error is a fallacious reason.

original: de lta na /🔽khyed kyis ji ltar khas blangs pa khyed kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa las the tshom za bas gcig tu nges par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na / khyed kyis ji ltar khas blangs pa khyed kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa las the tshom za bas gcig tu nges par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case,🔽you do not ascertain the pervasion by the mere reversal of the dissimilar instance, as you have accepted.

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because you accept the reversal by the mere nonobservation of the similar instance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: khyed kyis dogs pa med par sbyor bar bya ste /🔽mig dang rna ba ni phrad nas 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: khyed kyis dogs pa med par sbyor bar bya ste / mig dang rna ba ni phrad nas 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: you should apply the reason without hesitation.🔽The eyes and ears apprehend by contact because they are external sense faculties, like the nose,

original: phyi'i dbang po yin pa'i phyir sna bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa ni mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: phyi'i dbang po yin pa'i phyir sna bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa ni mngon sum yin te /
translated: and conception is direct perception because it is valid knowledge, like inference.

original: tshad ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir ma mthong ba tsam ldog pa ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir ma mthong ba tsam ldog pa ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this case, the mere nonobservation of the similar instance is not established as the reversal.

original: gzhan du yang /
analyzed: gzhan du yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: bdag dang sa la shes yod sogs //
analyzed: bdag dang sa la shes yod sogs //
translated: the self, earth, and so on exist because of consciousness and so on.

original: med par rab sgrub med min pa'i //🔽gtan tshigs 'ga' yang dgag pa yang //
analyzed: med par rab sgrub med min pa'i // gtan tshigs 'ga' yang dgag pa yang //
translated: The non-existence of the reason in the dissimilar instances is not established, and there is no other reason to refute the existence of the reason in the dissimilar instances.

original: gtan tshigs med sgrub min nam ci //🔽zhes bshad pa la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa dang med pa la the tshom za ba la yang dag pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs su byed 'dod de dper na gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs med sgrub min nam ci // zhes bshad pa la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa dang med pa la the tshom za ba la yang dag pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs su byed 'dod de dper na gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: Is it not the case that the non-existence of the reason in the dissimilar instances is not established?

original: srog dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: srog dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: The opponent wishes to use as a reason the existence or non-existence of the similar and dissimilar instances, as in the case of the syllogism, The living body possesses a self, because it possesses life-force.

original: nges pa ma yin pa lta bu'i //
analyzed: nges pa ma yin pa lta bu'i //
translated: This is like the case of the uncertain reason.

original: dva ra dva dzas 'gal ba rnam par dbye ba'i brjod pa dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: dva ra dva dzas 'gal ba rnam par dbye ba'i brjod pa dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: Dharmakīrti's Exposition of Valid Cognition says, The contradiction of the thesis is clear.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang nye bas gzhan grub par brjod pa ni /🔽dper na rdul phra rab ni rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang nye bas gzhan grub par brjod pa ni / dper na rdul phra rab ni rtag pa yin te /
translated: The statement of the other's position that is similar to the probandum is as follows.

original: bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: For example, The atom is permanent, because it possesses activity, like a pot. This is similar to the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir rdul phra rab rnams ni bya ba dang ldan pa yin te lus dang bya ba dang gzugs dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdul phra rab rnams ni bya ba dang ldan pa yin te lus dang bya ba dang gzugs dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Because the atoms have activity, because they have a body, activity, and form, they are not tenable as permanent,

original: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the subject is not established.

original: rdul phra rab ni mtshon pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab ni mtshon pa can ma yin te /
translated: The atom is not an example,

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur bas gtan tshigs thams cad kyang ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur bas gtan tshigs thams cad kyang ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that the reason is not established, and because it follows that all reasons are not established.

original: phyogs yong ba de tsam gyis phyogs kyi chos su de ni de ltar gyur ba yang yin no //
analyzed: phyogs yong ba de tsam gyis phyogs kyi chos su de ni de ltar gyur ba yang yin no //
translated: That much is the property of the subject in the position of the opponent.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa chos can gyi phyogs kyi chos su 'dod pa @149b yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa chos can gyi phyogs kyi chos su 'dod pa @149b yin te /
translated: It is asserted as the property of the subject in the position of the proponent, in terms of the probandum,

original: 'ba' zhig bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not merely the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de yang gal te chos can la sgrub par byed pa med na mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de yang gal te chos can la sgrub par byed pa med na mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And that subject of the probandum, if the proof does not occur in the subject, it is not.

original: sgrub par byed pa de'i bsgrub par bya ba med na chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs de lta bu phyogs kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de'i bsgrub par bya ba med na chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs de lta bu phyogs kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the probandum of the proof is not present, then such a reason, which is present in the subject, is not a property of the position.

original: gang gi tshe de lta ma yin pa yang sgrub par khas blangs nas chos can gyi chos su bstan pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta ma yin pa yang sgrub par khas blangs nas chos can gyi chos su bstan pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But when one accepts that it is not so, and teaches it as a property of the subject, then it is not a reason.

original: des na yang yod pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyogs kyi chos brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na yang yod pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyogs kyi chos brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the property of the position that is qualified by existence that is intended to be stated.

original: de lta ma yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i ma grub par gyur ba des na 'di 'dir brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i ma grub par gyur ba des na 'di 'dir brjod pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would be unestablished, being the same as the probandum. Therefore, this is stated here.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa de lta bu phyogs kyi chos kyi bsgrub par bya ba tsam sgrub pa de'i tshe ci phyogs kyi chos 'di lta bu ma shes par rjes su dpag par bya ba gsal bar
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa de lta bu phyogs kyi chos kyi bsgrub par bya ba tsam sgrub pa de'i tshe ci phyogs kyi chos 'di lta bu ma shes par rjes su dpag par bya ba gsal bar
translated: If a reason of that kind, which is present in a subject where the probandum is absent, proves the probandum that is merely the property of the position, then at that time, how is the inferential subject clarified without understanding such a property of the position?

original: byed dam 'on te gzhan gyi nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pas yin /
analyzed: byed dam 'on te gzhan gyi nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pas yin /
translated: Or is it the ascertainment of another?

original: gang gi tshe ma shes pas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ma shes pas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
translated: When it is not known, it is not a means of knowledge, because it is completely beyond being a means of knowledge that causes knowledge.

original: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ni bdag nyid kyi shes pa la ltos nas shes bya'i don gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ni bdag nyid kyi shes pa la ltos nas shes bya'i don gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: A means of knowledge that causes knowledge is that which causes the object of knowledge to be known in dependence on one’s own knowledge.

original: gtan tshigs yod pa tsam gyis gsal bar rtogs pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs yod pa tsam gyis gsal bar rtogs pa yin na ni /
translated: If one understands the object by the mere presence of the means of knowledge,

original: rgol ba dang phyir rgol bas gzhan gyis gzhung lugs sna tshogs byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgol ba dang phyir rgol bas gzhan gyis gzhung lugs sna tshogs byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the proponent and opponent would not make various arguments.

original: go bar byed pa shes pa yang tshad mas de rnam par nges pa 'am tshad mar bden par nges pa'i tshad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: go bar byed pa shes pa yang tshad mas de rnam par nges pa 'am tshad mar bden par nges pa'i tshad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And the knowledge that causes understanding would not be a means of knowledge that ascertains that object by means of a valid cognition or a valid cognition that ascertains the truth.

original: de lta ma yin na tshad ma nyid rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tshad ma nyid rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, then the very means of knowledge would be undermined.

original: gang gi phyir tshad ma 'di tshad ma nyid du ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma'i dngos po 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshad ma 'di tshad ma nyid du ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma'i dngos po 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Since this valid cognition is not the nature of what is established, therefore this very thing of valid cognition is what is being clarified.

original: de yang 'di'i tshad ma nyid du yod pa yin na de ji ltar tshad ma ma yin zhes brjod par bya //
analyzed: de yang 'di'i tshad ma nyid du yod pa yin na de ji ltar tshad ma ma yin zhes brjod par bya //
translated: And if that exists as its valid cognition, then how could it be said not to be valid cognition?

original: gang yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du med pa tshad mas gtan tshigs kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du 'dod na ni /
analyzed: gang yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du med pa tshad mas gtan tshigs kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du 'dod na ni /
translated: Moreover, if one asserts that the property of the subject is not established by valid cognition in the probandum,

original: phyogs la chos yod pa nyid kyis go bar bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs la chos yod pa nyid kyis go bar bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be understood by the mere existence of the property in the subject,

original: gtan tshigs kyi tshad ma de nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽de nyid kyis bsgrub @150a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi tshad ma de nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro // de nyid kyis bsgrub @150a * //
translated: because the valid cognition of the reason establishes that.🔽By that very [valid cognition], this property to be established

original: pa'i chos 'di yang skye ba'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi 'di'i don byed pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: pa'i chos 'di yang skye ba'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi 'di'i don byed pa ci yang med do //
translated: is also produced, so there is no function of the reason at all.

original: gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos grub par brjod par rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos grub par brjod par rigs pa yin te /
translated: It is reasonable to say that the property of being a mere reason is established.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason would not be established.

original: 'di ltar gtan tshigs 'di de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la brgya la grub pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can med na 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gtan tshigs 'di de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la brgya la grub pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can med na 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: For if this reason, in order to prove that, were not established with regard to the subject, then it would not be tenable.

original: lhan cig tu skye na ni grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhan cig tu skye na ni grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to arise simultaneously, then it would be established.

original: de na yang tshad ma de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang ji ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de na yang tshad ma de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang ji ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And in that case, how could the property to be established not be established by that very means of knowledge?

original: mi dgos so zhe na ni 'di dpyad par bya'i //
analyzed: mi dgos so zhe na ni 'di dpyad par bya'i //
translated: If you say that it is not necessary, then this should be investigated.

original: de lta na yang de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang lhan cig tu go bar byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de lta na yang de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang lhan cig tu go bar byed pa yin na ni /
translated: Even if it were like that, if it were to be understood simultaneously with the property to be established by that very means of knowledge,

original: gtan tshigs don med pa nyid kyis mi 'thad pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don med pa nyid kyis mi 'thad pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the reason would be pointless, and it would be established that it is not tenable.

original: de ltar na ji srid du mi mthun pa'i phyogs la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mi brten par grub pa de srid du gtan tshigs kyang yin la /
analyzed: de ltar na ji srid du mi mthun pa'i phyogs la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mi brten par grub pa de srid du gtan tshigs kyang yin la /
translated: Thus, as long as it is established that the property to be established does not rely on the discordant side, for that long it is a reason.

original: ji srid du gtan tshigs ma grub pa de srid bsgrub par bya ba yang mi 'grub pas phan tshun brten par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du gtan tshigs ma grub pa de srid bsgrub par bya ba yang mi 'grub pas phan tshun brten par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as the reason is not established, the probandum is not established, and thus it follows that they are mutually dependent.🔽Since the probandum would be established and completed at the time the property of the subject is not established, it is pointless to follow the later reason.

original: phyogs kyi chos ma grub pa'i dus su bsgrub par bya ba grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur bas phyis kyi gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba don med pa dang 'di mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid ba bzhi 'am /🔽mtshan nyid pa lnga yang brjod bya zhe'o //🔽kho bo cag gi 'dod pa ni chos can la yod pa tsam du rigs nas dus phyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa shes pa yin pa 'am /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos ma grub pa'i dus su bsgrub par bya ba grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur bas phyis kyi gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba don med pa dang 'di mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid ba bzhi 'am / mtshan nyid pa lnga yang brjod bya zhe'o // kho bo cag gi 'dod pa ni chos can la yod pa tsam du rigs nas dus phyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa shes pa yin pa 'am /
translated: And it would be a reason that is not established, one that is contradictory, one that is not concomitant, one that is unproven, or one that is untimely.🔽We assert that after the mere presence on the subject is ascertained, the knowledge of the forward and reverse pervasions arises.

original: thams cad bsdus nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa shes pa'i dus phyis chos can la yod pa tsam shes pa'i de ma thag tu bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de la rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad bsdus nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa shes pa'i dus phyis chos can la yod pa tsam shes pa'i de ma thag tu bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de la rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Or, after all are combined, the knowledge of the forward and reverse pervasions arises, and then immediately after the mere presence on the subject is ascertained, the understanding of the probandum with respect to the subject arises.

original: des na 'dir nye bar ma lus pa'i tshogs nas mkha' la chu dang me gnas pa'i mi rnyed pa lta bu'i phyin ci log la gting mi tshugs pa'i brjod pas chog go //
analyzed: des na 'dir nye bar ma lus pa'i tshogs nas mkha' la chu dang me gnas pa'i mi rnyed pa lta bu'i phyin ci log la gting mi tshugs pa'i brjod pas chog go //
translated: Therefore, here it is sufficient to state that the opponent's position is a fallacy, like the non-discovery of water and fire existing in the sky.

original: gal te de ltar na 'dir 'dod pa yang ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na 'dir 'dod pa yang ci yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then what is the point of this discussion?

original: ji ltar rigs pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response is, The appearance of a reason, etc.

original: gang dang gang gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bshad pa de ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bshad pa de ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: Whatever is explained as the appearance of a reason is a ground for defeat.

original: de skad du yang kho bo cag gis gang //
analyzed: de skad du yang kho bo cag gis gang //
translated: As it is said, Whatever is a reason for one's own position,

original: gcig la ma grub the tshom na //
analyzed: gcig la ma grub the tshom na //
translated: if it is not established for one, it is a ground for defeat.🔽If it is doubted whether it is not established,

original: ma grub pa dang 'khrul pa can //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'khrul pa can //
translated: it is a ground for defeat because of non-establishment and error.

original: @150b gnyis ma grub pa 'ang the tshom na //
analyzed: @150b gnyis ma grub pa 'ang the tshom na //
translated: If it is doubted whether it is not established for both,

original: 'gal ba dang ni 'khrul pa can //🔽zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang ni 'khrul pa can //🔽zhes bshad do //
translated: it is a ground for defeat because of contradiction and error.

original: 'o na rtsod pa'i rigs pa 'di'i rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i lam ni 'jig rten ma lus pa'i gnyen du gyur pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi rtsod pa sgrub pa rgyal po chen po'i lam po che gtod pa dang / klo gros /
analyzed: 'o na rtsod pa'i rigs pa 'di'i rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i lam ni 'jig rten ma lus pa'i gnyen du gyur pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi rtsod pa sgrub pa rgyal po chen po'i lam po che gtod pa dang / klo gros /
translated: Now, the path of reasoning in this reasoning debate is the great highway of the great king of reasonings that establishes debate, which is the friend of all the world, the master Vasubandhu.🔽The master Dignaga's Examination of Reasons also gives detailed examples, which crush the elephant of bad desires.

original: ngan pa'i 'dod pa'i glang po che'i klad pa 'gems par byed pa dang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga mas kyis rigs pa brtag par zhib tu dpe brjod zin pas khyod kyi de yang btags pa la thag pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba 'di
analyzed: ngan pa'i 'dod pa'i glang po che'i klad pa 'gems par byed pa dang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga mas kyis rigs pa brtag par zhib tu dpe brjod zin pas khyod kyi de yang btags pa la thag pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba 'di
translated: Therefore, what is the use of this rope for you?

original: la rtsod pa'i lan du de nyid mthong ba 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: la rtsod pa'i lan du de nyid mthong ba 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di bshad pa yin no //
translated: This verse, The world sees reality... and so on, is explained as the reply to that debate.

original: rab rib can gyi tshogs dag ni rab rib can gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: rab rib can gyi tshogs dag ni rab rib can gyi tshogs so //
translated: A group of those with eye disease means a group of those with eye disease.

original: ma rigs pa'i rab rib can gyi tshogs ni ma rig pa'i rab rib can gyi tshogs te /
analyzed: ma rigs pa'i rab rib can gyi tshogs ni ma rig pa'i rab rib can gyi tshogs te /
translated: A group with the eye disease of ignorance means a group with the eye disease of ignorance.

original: de kho na'i don mthong ba la gags byad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na'i don mthong ba la gags byad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it obstructs the seeing of reality.

original: de gcod par byed ba rtsod pa'i rigs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de gcod par byed ba rtsod pa'i rigs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word cuts is to be supplied.
